author: covener
msg: mod_ldap: remove hard-coded loops of 10 retries w/o delay with a configurable
number of retries (LDAPRetries, default 3) and configurable delay between
The LDAP connection is re-initted every other retry, instead of
on the fifth retry -- this was a much more recent addition then

author: simonetripodi
msg: fixed checkstyle violations: Expression can be simplified

author: jvs
msg: HIVE-1538. filter is removed due to regression of HIVE-1538

author: jcian
msg: Adding the default container.js file from Shindig beta-2 unmodified so that we'll have a good base file to compare against in the future (so we can easily see what we've changed).  I'll be checking in a modified version of this file shortly (in support of the security token work).
